description: Demolition of existing Thames Water buildings and water tanks, re-development of site to provide 44 residential units comprising of 6 x 1-bed flats, 19 x 2-bed flats, 9 x 3-bed flats, 4 x 3-bed houses and 6 x 4-bed houses (Revised description).
